reviewText: The subtitled version is better.  Dubbing in English is not good.  The leading lady is beautiful.  That alone is worth the purchase.

For unknown reasons most movies I buy are censored so I have no choice but do research, compare running times and try to find longest copy. Even movies over 50 years old are censored. So, pay attention what you buying. IMDB doesnt help all the time too. I am not sure why anybody want censor Tinto Brass as his movies are generally softcore.

This version is only 86 & 1/2 minutes long not 92 as advertised. There is another ntsc version of this movie called transgressing. It does not say how long it is. Amazon told me it is 94 minutes. If anyone nows how long it is please leave a review here.

i own two other versions of this movie.  i was looking for the one that shows all the HC content as well, but none thus far.  i was hoping that this version had it, but it doesn't.  The best of all of them, thus far - if more "scenes" is what you were looking for.

The movie itself is priceless.  The main actress is easily the hottest adult-themed model out there, and challenge anyone to prove me wrong.  i highly recommend this movie, especially this version.  Worth the money, and time.  Great way to spend an hour-plus of your time.
